Be alert for the possible merging behavior of the white van on the left, as it is occupying the adjacent lane. If the mixer truck comes to a stop or the speed of that lane begins to fall below the speed of the neighboring lanes, observe the surrounding lanes for safe opportunities to change lanes. If the traffic light is green, proceed cautiously through the intersection, but be prepared to stop if the light changes. Pay attention to the yellow and white road barriers, ensuring that your vehicle does not cross into restricted areas. Be aware of potential developments ahead that may require lane changes or stopping. Additionally, drive carefully as the road surface may be wet or uneven. Stay attentive to the surrounding traffic and anticipate the actions of other drivers.
